name: Incredible Potato Casserole
author: Jenn Harmon Jones
summary: This recipe has been in the family for years and is always a huge hit.  The potatoes can be substituted for frozen hash browns making it really easy to prepare and still tastes great.
ingredients: 1 (10.5 ounce) can condensed cream of mushroom soup
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Lightly grease a 2 1/2 quart casserole dish
Place whole potatoes in their skins into a large pot of boiling water; cook for 25 to 30 minutes
When cool enough to handle, peel potatoes, and grate into a medium bowl
Melt 1/4 cup butter in a large skillet over medium heat
Stir in soup; cook until soup begins to bubble
Remove from stove, and mix in sour cream, green onion, and cheese
In a resealable bag, shake together the cornflake crumbs and 2 tablespoons melted butter
Bake in a preheated oven 45 minutes
